synopsis.text: Koko, a human boy, is found and adopted by the legendary Pokémon Zarude in the heart of the Okoya Forest, a Pokémon haven with stringent rules that prohibit outsiders. Koko grows up believing he is a Pokémon, but when he encounters Ash and Pikachu, he begins to question his identity. As the forest faces threats, Koko's bond with his Pokémon family and his newfound human friendship are tested, leading him on a journey of self-discovery and courage.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
